projects.name: Virtual Mouse
projects.description: Developed a real-time gesture recognition system using Python and MediaPipe to control system functions like cursor movement, volume, brightness, and scrolling. It identifies hand gestures dynamically, enabling seamless human-computer interaction through intuitive hand movements.

projects.name: Real Time Sign Language Detector
projects.description: Built a real-time sign language detection system with MediaPipe and OpenCV for live input processing. Used TensorFlow for accurate gesture predictions.

projects.name: Smart Control of Traffic Light
projects.description: Smart Traffic Light Control using Artificial Intelligence optimizes traffic flow by analyzing real-time data through AI algorithms. It reduces congestion, minimizes wait times, and enhances urban mobility for a smoother and safer commuting experience.
